The Dell XPS 15 has problems with its trackpad
T3 Magazine/Future via Getty Images
Dell has admitted that some of its flagship XPS 15 laptops have shipped with wobbly trackpads.

articles.title: Hazelight announces It Takes Two: dolls, divorce, and a "crazy roller-coaster ride" - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Hazelight has now announced its new game, It Takes Two: a co-op action-adventure platformer about two parents going through a divorce, whose minds are transplanted into dolls.
